verses.verse: Forasmuch then <S%G3767><s%> as Christ <S%G5547><s%> hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> arm <S%G3695><s%> yourselves <S%G5210><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> mind: <S%G1771><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he that hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> hath ceased <S%G3973><s%> from sin; <S%G266><s%>

That he no longer <S%G3371><s%> should live <S%G980><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rest <S%G1954><s%> of his time <S%G5550><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> to the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to the will <S%G2307><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> past <S%G3928><s%> of our life <S%G979><s%> may suffice <S%G713><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to have wrought <S%G2716><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> when we walked <S%G4198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%> lusts, <S%G1939><s%> excess of wine, <S%G3632><s%> revellings, <S%G2970><s%> banquetings, <S%G4224><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abominable <S%G111><s%> idolatries: <S%G1495><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they think it strange <S%G3579><s%> that ye <S%G5216><s%> run not with <S%G4936><s%> <S%G3361><s%> them to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> excess <S%G401><s%> of riot, <S%G810><s%> speaking evil of <S%G987><s%> you:

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall give <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> to him that is <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> the quick <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> was the gospel preached <S%G2097><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them that are dead, <S%G3498><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be judged <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3303><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> in the spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> is at hand: <S%G1448><s%> be ye therefore sober, <S%G4993><s%> <S%G3767><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> watch <S%G3525><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> prayer. <S%G4335><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> fervent <S%G1618><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves: <S%G1438><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> charity <S%G26><s%> shall cover <S%G2572><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>
Use hospitality <S%G5382><s%> one to another <S%G240><s%> <S%G1519><s%> without <S%G427><s%> grudging. <S%G1112><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> hath received <S%G2983><s%> the gift, <S%G5486><s%> even so minister <S%G1247><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> one to another, <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1438><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the manifold <S%G4164><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

If any man <S%G1536><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> let him speak as <S%G5613><s%> the oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> if any man <S%G1536><s%> minister, <S%G1247><s%> let him do it as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the ability <S%G2479><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> giveth: <S%G5524><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> praise <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dominion <S%G2904><s%> forever and ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> think it not strange <S%G3579><s%> <S%G3361><s%> concerning the <S%G3588><s%> fiery trial <S%G4451><s%> which <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5213><s%> is <S%G1096><s%> to try <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3986><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> though some strange thing <S%G3581><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> unto you: <S%G5213><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> inasmuch as <S%G2526><s%> ye are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of Christ's <S%G5547><s%> sufferings; <S%G3804><s%> that, <S%G2443><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> shall be revealed, <S%G602><s%> ye may be glad <S%G5463><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with exceeding joy. <S%G21><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> ye be reproached <S%G3679><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> happy <S%G3107><s%> are ye; for <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> resteth <S%G373><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you: <S%G5209><s%> on their part <S%G2596><s%> <S%G846><s%> he <S%G3303><s%> is evil spoken of, <S%G987><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> on your part <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5209><s%> he is glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

But <S%G1063><s%> let none <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3361><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a murderer, <S%G5406><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> as a thief, <S%G2812><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> as an evildoer, <S%G2555><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a busybody in other men's matters. <S%G244><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man suffer as <S%G5613><s%> a Christian, <S%G5546><s%> let him not <S%G3361><s%> be ashamed; <S%G153><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> let him glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> behalf. <S%G3313><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> is come that judgment <S%G2917><s%> must begin <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it first <S%G4412><s%> begin at <S%G575><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> be of them that obey not <S%G544><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> scarcely <S%G3433><s%> be saved, <S%G4982><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> shall the <S%G3588><s%> ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sinner <S%G268><s%> appear? <S%G5316><s%>

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let <S%G2532><s%> them that suffer <S%G3958><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> commit the keeping of <S%G3908><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> to him in <S%G1722><s%> well doing, <S%G16><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto a faithful <S%G4103><s%> Creator. <S%G2939><s%>
